text: Nde na phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, nde Stefanas phorgap ana phenan ki ntɨɨri nde mbe kaŋgi. Mbe mba Akaia ŋgu bakɨme fhain ki gumgi rɨgar, mbe fharav guigira Zisas khothɨgap, mbe fhara Fhe Bakɨme zɨn panan ruagi. Mbe ruagiap, mbe wari won vuzvugara, mbe mba Fhe Bakɨmen gumgi gu mbigir kurkurarga ŋaara ndigi.
